sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.id FROM student JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id WHERE student.enroll_year = 2022 AND student.gender = '女' AND major.major_name = '软件工程' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM base

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“入学年份（常见问法：22级）”映射，22级对应入学年份2022
根据字段描述“性别（男/女等）”映射，女生对应值为'女'
根据字段描述“专业名称，专业实体映射主字段”映射，原文“软件工程”与major.major_name语义完全一致

output.executed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.id FROM student JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id WHERE student.enroll_year = 2022 AND student.gender = '女' AND major.major_name = '软件工程' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM base
